item.title: LeetCode
item.description: LeetCode 7-24-1184. 公交站间的距离 难度：简单 模拟 func distanceBetweenBusStops(distance []int, start int, destination int) int { if start > destination { return distanceBetweenBusStops(distance, destination, start) } aSum := 0 bSum := 0 for i := 0; i < len(distance); i++ { if i >= start && i < destination { aSum += distance[i] } else { bSum += distance[i] } } return int(math.Min(float64(aSum), float64(bSum))) } 6-21-1108. IP 地址无效化 难度：简单 模拟
